What is the trick to posting a video?   Go to the video on Youtube , hit where its says "Share" and then you will be presented with an option " Imbed " click there and a bunch of goobledegook will show in a box highlighted in blue, copy that and return to the tab where OFC is and where you want to put the video. Hit reply and use the more options Enable HTML and paste it in where you want it. Maybe there is an easier way but that is how I do  it.
Yes. Just copy the URL link in your address bar and paste it in.

Yes. Just copy the URL link in your address bar and paste it in.    Well damn, that is a new one to me. At one time, all that would do would be to put a clickable link in your reply that would take you to the video on Youtube if you clicked on it.
